title: Lorenzo Migliorelli
text:
Lorenzo Migliorelli (born 3 May 1998) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
Atalanta.
Loan to Venezia.
On 9 July 2018, he joined <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a> club <a href="Venezia%20F.C.">Venezia</a> on a two-year loan. He did not make any appearances for Venezia in the first half of the 2018–19 season, and the loan was terminated early on 25 January 2019.
Loan to Virtus Entella.
On the same day, he joined <a href="Virtus%20Entella">Virtus Entella</a> on loan. He made his <a href="Serie%20C">Serie C</a> debut for Virtus on 27 January 2019 in a game against <a href="A.C.%20Cuneo%201905">Cuneo</a>, as a 64th-minute substitute for <a href="Carlo%20Crialese">Carlo Crialese</a>.
Loan to Siena.
On 11 July 2019, he joined <a href="Robur%20Siena">Siena</a> on loan.
Gubbio.
On 19 August 2020 he joined <a href="A.S.%20Gubbio%201910">Gubbio</a>. On 13 January 2022, his contract was terminated by mutual consent.
